did.unittitle: Subject - Civil Defense - Boy Scouts of America Publications - Family "Be Prepared" Plan (1951); First Aid And Rescue Methods (1951); Pattern For Survival - A Guide for Unit Leaders (1951); Civil Defense Guide (1950-1951); Collection, Distribution And Communication Services (1951). Also Memorandum from Office of Sen. Dennis Chavez regarding establishment of a Committee for the Preservation of Human Life (ca. 1955).
